mapper.select: select rp.probe_id AS probe_id, rp.port AS port, rp.task_id AS task_id, rp.service_type AS service_type, rp.target_id AS target_id, rp.target_ip AS target_ip, rp.record_time AS record_time, rp.record_date AS record_date, probe.city_id AS city_id, probe.county_id AS county_id, AVG(rp.dns_delay) AS dns_delay, AVG(rp.conn_delay) AS conn_delay, AVG(rp.headbyte_delay) AS headbyte_delay, AVG(rp.download_rate) AS download_rate, rp.remark AS remark FROM record_web_download rp LEFT JOIN probe ON rp.probe_id =probe.id WHERE rp.record_date = #{record_date} AND rp.record_time BETWEEN #{start_time} AND #{terminal_time} AND rp.state = 0 GROUP BY rp.port,rp.service_type,rp.target_id,rp.task_id,rp.probe_id;

select rp.probe_id AS probe_id, rp.port AS port, rp.task_id AS task_id, rp.service_type AS service_type, rp.target_id AS target_id, rp.target_ip AS target_ip, rp.record_time AS record_time, rp.record_date AS record_date, probe.city_id AS city_id, probe.county_id AS county_id, AVG(rp.dns_delay) AS dns_delay, AVG(rp.conn_delay) AS conn_delay, AVG(rp.headbyte_delay) AS headbyte_delay, AVG(rp.download_rate) AS download_rate, rp.remark AS remark FROM record_web_download rp LEFT JOIN probe ON rp.probe_id =probe.id WHERE rp.record_date = #{record_date} AND rp.state = 0 GROUP BY rp.port,rp.service_type,rp.target_id,rp.task_id,rp.probe_id;
mapper.delete:
delete from record_web_download where id in
#{id}
